Share Facebook Email ARTICLE 9 Contracts State Finance (STF) CHAPTER 56 SECTION 135 Separate specifications for contract work for the state SECTION 135-A Definitions SECTION 136 Contracts in pursuance of appropriations SECTION 136-A Contracts for architectural, engineering, geological, landscape architecture and surveying services SECTION 136-B Selection of underwriters by state agencies SECTION 136-C Contracts for employee training and organizational development services SECTION 136-D Contracts involving industrial painting and industrial coatings SECTION 136-D*2 Contracts involving low embodied carbon concrete SECTION 137 Bond to secure payment of certain claims arising from a public improvement; enforcement SECTION 138 State contracts not to be assigned without consent SECTION 138-A Commencement of actions on state public works contracts SECTION 139 Retained percentages SECTION 139-A Ground for cancellation of contract by state SECTION 139-B Disqualification to contract with state SECTION 139-C Removal of disqualification of public contractors by petition SECTION 139-D Statement of non-collusion in bids to the state SECTION 139-E Security bonds; municipal projects SECTION 139-F Payment on public work projects SECTION 139-G Obligations to make contracts available to small and certified women and minority-owned business concerns SECTION 139-H Participation in an international boycott prohibited SECTION 139-I Obligations with respect to procurement contracts with New York state and foreign business enterprises SECTION 139-J Restrictions on contacts during the procurement process SECTION 139-K Disclosure of contacts and responsibility of offerers SECTION 139-L Statement on sexual harassment, in bids SECTION 139-M Statement on gender-based violence and the workplace, in bids SECTION 140 Disposition of deposit accompanying bid SECTION 141 Claims against contractors SECTION 142 Workmen's compensation insurance on public works SECTION 143 Deposits on plans and specifications for contracts for public work SECTION 144 Opening and reading of bids for contracts for public work; criminal conspiracies SECTION 145 Acceptance of final payment under a state contract SECTION 146 Certain construction contracts involving steel SECTION 147 Mentor-protege program SECTION 148 Certain contracts involving personal protective equipment and medical supplies
